18-3  身体障害者手帳交付台帳登載状況及び「愛の手帳」交付状況（平成26～30年度） 18-3  DATA FROM THE PHYSICAL IMPAIRMENT CERTIFICATE ISSUE LEDGER AND ISSUE OF THE INTELLECTUAL IMPAIRMENT CERTIFICATE ( Fiscal Years 2014?2018 )
注 1) 「愛の手帳」交付数の総数は，都外施設に入所している場合等で管轄区市町村が未定の者を含むため，内訳と一致しない。

Note: 1) The total number of intellectual impairment certificates issued does not match the breakdown because it includes persons who were not under the jurisdiction of a municipality for reasons such as living in facilities outside Tokyo.
